'''Fieschi''' was an upstanding [[Netherese]] [[fighter]] who helped guard the [[Netheril Mint]] in [[Eileanar]] until its destruction in {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}.
document_data.Activities: Fieschi worked under [[Everdingen]] alongside [[Szematseen]], with the pair serving as Everdingen's lieutenants. Together they commanded the Mint's guards and maintained extremely tight security, with rigorous devotion to the law.
